channel.title: Item rewards for over 11k
channel.description:
Posts in the discussion thread "Item rewards for over 11k" - I recently won the over 11k item so I thought I'd give info on each item I receive each day. I will update each time I get something new.
Also, the prize won can be sold for 11,001 ryo at the shop.

item.title: Re: Item rewards for over 11k
item.content:encoded:
I played 3 times and won.

It's all luck because it resets to a random number after someone wins.

item.title: Re: Item rewards for over 11k
item.content:encoded:
wow soo lucky mate. =]

howd you get it? like did you only buy one tiket and got lucky?

item.title: Item rewards for over 11k
item.content:encoded:
Day 1: extra bonus 11k party house ryo.
Day 2: Extra 111 stamina
Day 3: 11k ryo. Not just party house.
Day 4: 11k ryo again.
Day 5: 11.01k jutsu exp.
Day 6: Lost all of party house ryo. Bad drop.
Day 7: 11k ryo.
